name: Tri gust is megl che uan
name_original: Tri gust is megl che uan
description:
Hard times in the Realm. Enemies? A lot, from a red portal. Hireable heroes? Just one of them.

Not the smartest. Not the bravest.

But his faith is higher than his courage.

He can pray anche change himself, being a knight to fight beasts, a rogue to slay bugs and a mage to restrain monsters.

But he also can pay to build a tower that will shot bullets at regular intervals, just in case. When he don't want a tower, he can destroy it to have some money back.

Be aware, non stop action here.

Game made in less than 72h for Gameloop.it game jam 0 with the fantastic TIC-80 using Kenney 1bit assets!

Really non polished release
